workflow.name: Create and send multi-item PayPal invoices via email
workflow.description:
### Who Is This For?  
Small businesses, consultants, agencies‚Ä¶ anyone who bills with PayPal.

### What Problem Does It Solve?  
Automates itemized invoicing and delivery via PayPal‚Äôs Invoicing API with support for an ‚ÄúAdd more items?‚Äù loop.

### What This Workflow Does  
1. Collects your PayPal credentials & invoice data via a form  
2. Dynamically generates a timestamp + random 4 digit number for the invoice_number  
3. Calls PayPal to create and then send the invoice  
4. Supports endless line-items via a Switch + Merge loop.

### Setup  
1. Grab a PayPal REST App‚Äôs Client ID & Secret.  
2. Toggle ‚ÄúLive or Test‚Äù to point at production vs sandbox.  
3. **PayPal Credentials**  
   - If you select **Test**, this workflow points at PayPal‚Äôs **sandbox** (`api-m.sandbox.paypal.com`) and **requires your sandbox** Client ID & Secret.  
   - If you select **Live**, it points at PayPal‚Äôs **production** endpoint (`api-m.paypal.com`) and **requires your live** Client ID & Secret.  
4. (Optional) Customize your logo, currency, default notes.

### How to Customize  
‚Äì Change the currency dropdown  
‚Äì Tweak the invoice-number format in the ‚ÄúSet Invoice Number and Date‚Äù code node  
‚Äì Swap out or style the n8n Form nodes for your own UX
